meanings.sent1: The discounted shirt was much cheaper than the regular one.
meanings.sent2: I bought discounted shoes on sale.
meanings.sent3: The discounted candy made the kids very happy.
meanings.sent4: Her discounted offer was too good to resist.
meanings.sent5: The discounted tickets sold out quickly.

meanings.definition: To deduct a certain amount from the original price.
meanings.sent1: I discounted ten dollars from the total cost.
meanings.sent2: The store discounted the item for clearance.
meanings.sent3: He discounted the bill as a gesture of goodwill.
meanings.sent4: She discounted the price to attract more customers.
meanings.sent5: Discounted items are popular during sales events.

meanings.definition: To underestimate the significance or value of something.
meanings.sent1: I discounted the importance of his advice.
meanings.sent2: She discounted the impact of her actions.
meanings.sent3: He discounted the value of the antique vase.
meanings.sent4: The team discounted the opponent's skills too soon.
meanings.sent5: Discounting his efforts would be a mistake.
